CORES.description: Business registration and compliance documents required for bidding.

requirements.name: Criminal record certificate
requirements.details: Certificate issued by the Prosecution Office for any criminal case initiated against the entity or its legal representative and certificate issued by the Judicial Register of the Ministry of Justice for the legal representative of the entity.

requirements.name: Certificate of no pending lawsuit
requirements.details: Certificate issued by the Court evidencing that the entity does not have a pending lawsuit/criminal case.

requirements.name: Certificate of good standing
requirements.details: For Albanian entities, a certificate issued by the Court evidencing that the entity is not in the process of liquidation or bankruptcy.

requirements.name: Tax clearance
requirements.details: From national and local tax authorities.

requirements.name: Copies of financial statements of 2023 and turnover certificates
Contracts of outsourced staff
requirements.details: If part of the full-time staff, highlight their names in the payroll register.
